## **Documentos** {.tabset}

<!--script for generating HORIZONTAL LINE-->
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:black;background-color:black">

### **Vigentes**

```{r documentos-vigentes, eval = has.downloads}
# read separate sheets
vigentes.raw <-
  readxl::read_excel("PPG/Downloads.xlsx",
             sheet = "Vigentes",
             col_types = c("text"))

# replace the link by a tag
for (i in 1:dim(vigentes.raw)[1]) {
  vigentes.raw[i, 3] <-
    paste("[↗️](", vigentes.raw[i, 3], '){target="_blank"}', sep = "")
}

# print table
if (dim(vigentes.raw)[1] != 0) {
  source("Scripts/table-with-buttons.R", local = knitr::knit_global())
  create_dt(vigentes.raw, title = "Documentos vigentes")
} else {
  cat("*Sem dados para exibir*")
}
```
